name: lamos
description: lists and maps of strings serialization
author: Kyle E. Mitchell <kyle@kemitchell.com> (https://kemitchell.com/)

scripts.test: npm run test:suite && npm run test:readme
scripts.test:readme: defence -i javascript README.md | sed "s!from 'lamos'!from './index.js'!" > README.js ; node README.js
